name: Amore Motor Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights after our arrival in New Zealand and were very pleased. Room had everything we needed, efficient air conditioner (it was very hot during our stay) and very quiet despite being quite close to a busy road. Shopping Mall with large supermarket very close by and airport bus stops almost outside so very convenient. Owners were charming and most helpful. Would recommend.
reviews.title: A Great Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were so pleased with our Tripadvisor recommended motels during our trip to New Zealand and this property is no exception. The lodge is very new and the rooms very spacious. We stayed one night and flew back home early the night before. After exploring a bit of Christchurch, we parked the car in the lot and walked down the street for a few pints at a couple local bars. After a nice relaxing hour on the outdoor patio, we ordered take away Chinese food and enjoyed it in the room with the well appointed kitchen items.
reviews.title: Great property!

reviews.text: The bed was comfortable, the room very well kept and the bathroom modern and nicely designed. The location, cleanliness and spaciousness of the motel make this an easy recommendation for future travelers.
reviews.title: Very pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for four nights in December the stay was very pleasant. Jose at the front desk was very accommodating since I arrived earlier than check-in. The room was great. Comfortable, clean, stylish. Bathroom was great. Fantastic water pressure and the kitchen was good. It was across the street from the mall and close to lots of Asian restaurants. I walked everywhere and it was a bit of a trek to get to the other side of Hagley Park, but was good exercise.
reviews.title: Very good!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 1 night a couple of days ago. Very clean - lovely! Reception staff very friendly and helpful. Great location. Everything you could need - the kitchen very well equipped, everything neat. Just great, highly recommend it. Plenty of amenities nearby, and only 5 mins from the airport. :o)
reviews.title: Totally new, very modern, perfect location!

reviews.text: Can't fault this place. Lovely studio room nice bed outdoor table and chairs and proper fridge microwave and 2 hot plates. Right next to Westfield mall. Lovely people running it. Will stay again when in Chch.
reviews.title: Great for business or pleasure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here twice on our recent New Zealand holiday and the staff were really helpful. Very clean premises and very close to facilities. Walking distance to restaurants and shopping mall. Will definitely stay again when we return in April.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
Excellent location and high quality with Hosts that care
reviews.text: We had a large group that stayed in a number of units. Free wifi, really helpful hosts and lovely rooms. Just across the road from the Riccarton Mall and supermarket. Also plenty of eateries within walking distance? The beds were really comfortable and the rooms quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Love staying here! beds are super comfy, units are cosy and clean, and shopping is just over the road, but top of the list are the very friendly hosts, we won't stay anywhere else now.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: We love staying here. Service is very good, hosts are friendly, understanding and helpful.
reviews.title: Worth a stay

reviews.text: Very nice Hotel located near Westfields (5min walk tops) Family unit we stayed at was huge with 1 queen or king bed and 2 singles in the other room. Living area was really big. Service was great also. Only complaint was that road noise in the morning was pretty loud as its close to the main road
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent one night at Amore. The weather was atrocious but we were made very welcome by the staff. Our room was clean and modern
reviews.title: Perfect stay

reviews.text: The motel was quiet, had full cooking facilities and was close to the Riccarton shopping mall and restaurants.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Totaly Wow Factor!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved our stay in this comfortable, clean and conveniently located motel.
reviews.title: Perfect Choice

reviews.text: Very friendly and honest service. Very welcoming staff who clearly take a lot of pride in the appearance of the accommodation.
reviews.title: Top quality service

reviews.text: Daily room service was fantastic, especially not having to do any dishes! The kitchenette was the perfect size for meal preparation.
reviews.title: Home Away From Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bottle of wine provided on my final night was very much appreciated and a lovely gesture.
reviews.title: Thanks
Absolutely fantastic
reviews.text: Convenient to local transport and shopping centre - close enough to the city without feeling like you were right on top of it.

As a regular guest due to business, I so appreciate the always warm welcome and the feeling of getting extra special attention. The location is so convenient with a number of excellent eateries close by as well as the supermarket if I feel like being a domestic goddess. You're stuck with me now!
reviews.title: Great stay!

description: With 17 modern, stylish and comfortable self-contained units you can enjoy luxury accommodation featuring studio units and 2 bedroom apartments.
